casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Melvin Leroy FOWLER No. 173PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Mr. Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, For Fowler, Melvin Leroy. Mr. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Ms. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, For State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 5th of June 2017 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th of June 2017 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
